snippet: An elderly couple severely beaten in their Kansas City home, allegedly by a man also accused of fatally shooting three of their neighbors, died Tuesday after being taken off life support.
abstract: Elderly couple severely beaten in their Kansas City, Mo, home, dies after both are taken off life support; prosecutors say suspect Brandon Howell beat couple, then fatally shot three of their neighbors before fleeing with couple's SUV.
lead_paragraph: An elderly couple severely beaten in their Kansas City home, allegedly by a man also accused of fatally shooting three of their neighbors, died Tuesday after being taken off life support.

headline.main: Missouri: Two More Die in Neighborhood Attack
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Two More Die in Neighborhood Attack
